content:
We are going to perform an important system upgrade.

üìÖ Timeline:
- Full maintenance window begins: August 30th, 2025 05:50 UTC
- Full maintenance window expected duration: 2 hours

‚ö†Ô∏è Service Restrictions (Starting 05:50 UTC):
- Consider that for the full 2h window the system will be read-only
- There is going to be a limited-time window in which the system might be completely down.

We will provide more status updates during the maintenance window. 

Thank you for your understanding.
name: üõ†Ô∏è Scheduled maintenance [ ‚ö†Ô∏è DOWNTIME REQUIRED ]

updates.content:
Maintenance has begun.

The platform is now in read-only mode. All write operations will return a 503 error with code "PLATFORM_SCHEDULED_MAINTENANCE"

Calls to graphql.datocms.com continue to work correctly without interruptions.

There may be brief periods of time when the platform will stop responding to all requests, even read-only ones. In this scenario, calls to graphql.datocms.com already cached in our CDN will continue to work anyway.

We will continue to update the status page as soon as we have updates.

Maintenance has been completed successfully.

Read-only mode has been disabled. All operations have returned to normal.

We are monitoring the system. In case of problems, please contact support.
